AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: kwama egg miner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked tirelessly in a kwama egg mine for a considerable number of years. In this time [PAWN_pronoun] harvested many kwama eggs, from deep in the claustrophobic tunnels. Sadly [PAWN_possessive] time in the mines came to an end when the kwama were afflicted by the blight.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: volcanic glass miner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent many years working in the glass mines around Red Mountain. [PAWN_pronoun] thought volcanic glass was fascinating to look at, and always wanted to keep some for [PAWN_possessive]self.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: ebony miner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent what felt like decades working in the Vassir-Didanat ebony mine. In reality it was only months. These months, for better or worse, took a toll on [PAWN_possessive] body.
